subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: After leaving a hospital, the former N.B.A. All-Star Mookie Blaylock surrendered to the authorities and is in jail, charged with vehicular homicide in a crash south of Atlanta.
snippet: After leaving a hospital, the former N.B.A. All-Star Mookie Blaylock surrendered to the authorities and is in jail, charged with vehicular homicide in a crash south of Atlanta.
